contracts.title: Integration Testing for Batch 2 PRs
contracts.description: Execute integration testing for all 8 Batch 2 PRs once merged. Test web routes, Vector DB, Messaging, WorkIndexer, and Discord bot integrations.

contracts.title: Discord Router & Devlog Automation Health Monitoring
contracts.description: Maintain Discord router + devlog automation health. Monitor queue during PR merge push. Ensure all devlogs post successfully and archive properly.

contracts.title: Communications Templates for PR Merge Surge
contracts.description: Assist with communications templates and messaging during PR merge surge. Create standardized templates for PR summaries, integration testing results, and coordination updates.

contracts.title: Disk Space Monitoring & Cleanup
contracts.description: Continue proactive disk space monitoring and cleanup. Execute scheduled cleanups per DISK_SPACE_CLEANUP_SCHEDULE.md. Monitor temp directories and consolidation backups.

contracts.title: GitHub Consolidation - Phase 0 (4 repos)
contracts.description: Complete Phase 0 case variation merges: focusforge→FocusForge, tbowtactics→TBOWTactics, superpowered_ttrpg→Superpowered-TTRPG, dadudekc→DaDudekC. First merge prepared, blocked by GitHub API rate limit.

contracts.title: GitHub Consolidation - Group 7 (GPT/AI Automation)
contracts.description: Merge gpt_automation → selfevolving_ai and extract GPT patterns from Auto_Blogger. Execute after Phase 0 complete.

notes: GitHub consolidation is HIGH priority active assignment. Phase 0 merges ready to resume when API rate limit resets. Integration testing contract pending PR merges. Discord and disk space monitoring are ongoing active contracts.
